name: Denim & Co. Vertical Printed Long Sleeve Top
description: Stand out from the crowd with this Denim & Co. long-sleeved top. The solid sleeves and back emphasize the printed front, while the scoop neckline adds a touch of simplicity. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Susan Graver Printed Feather Weave Sleeveless Tunic
description: Light up your look. Energize any ensemble in this striking sleeveless tunic from Susan Graver. The appealing abstract print is complemented by solid side panels and trim at the V-neckline. Feather weave fabric makes this lightweight looker a dream to wear. From Susan Graver.

name: Liz Claiborne New York Short Sleeve Open Front Lace Shrug
description: So sweet! Top off your ensemble in ultra-feminine fashion with this open-front lace shrug. It's detailed with beautiful scalloped edging and set-in sleeves. From Liz Claiborne New York.

name: Breezies Wild Rose Lace Seamless Support Bra
smoothXbike Pro Compact Foldable Exercise Bike
description: A bike built for you. The compact, foldable SmoothXbike Bike makes it easy to exercise with features that accommodate your comfort, schedule, and space. Now, there's no reason you can't fit a workout in, regardless of the weather outside!

name: Juice Beauty Serum Foundation with Angle Brush
description: What is it: Juice Beauty's Flawless Serum Foundation is the perfect bridge between skin care and makeup, combining the beneficial effects of a foundation and serum in one product. Flawless Serum Foundation hydrates skin and creates smoother-looking skin in one easy step. It's infused with a unique technology that provides comfort and ease of application and leaves skin looking glowing. This buildable to medium-coverage liquid foundation blends seamlessly for a flawless finish while delivering a noticeably youthful-looking appearance.

name: Poo-Pourri Set of (3) 4 oz. Bathroom Deodorizers in Organza Bags
description: Keeping things fresh has never been so easy. Whether you're at home or visiting family or friends, Poo-Pourri has you covered. This set of three bathroom deodorizers lets you leave one in your home, give one as a gift, and keep one on you for emergency situations. Simply spray the toilet bowl before you go, and let the nine essential oils do the rest of the work, creating a protective film on the surface of the water to help prevent odor. From Poo-Pourri.

name: Iced Up Salad on Ice Bowl with Locking Lid
description: Cover your food in coldness with the Iced Up bowl. When you attach its ice chamber to this 5.5-quart bowl, cold air descends from the sealed lid to help keep your cold food colder for longer. There's also a snap-on lid that makes transporting the whole bowl easy. Take it with you out to the pool, your neighbor's house, or in the car. When using the bowl for foods that are not cold, you can still use the ice chamber to hold salsa or dip.

name: Northern Nights 400TC 100% Egyptian Cotton Dobby Stripe Hem Sheet Set
description: If you didn't already look forward to bedtime, you certainly will with these Egyptian cotton sheets from Northern Nights on your bed. Combining a handsome dobby woven hemline with a high 400-thread count, they feel every bit as sophisticated and sumptuous as they look. From Northern Nights(R) Bedding.

name: Denim & Co. Essentials Bateau Neck 3/4 Sleeve Knit Top
description: An anytime, anywhere, everyday essential. What's great about this cotton top is that the bateau neckline and 3/4-length sleeves make it stand out from other basic tees, but you can still dress it up with a jacket and statement jewelry, dress it down with comfy lounge wear, or layer it for changing seasons. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Josie Maran Whipped Argan Oil Mud Mask
description: Delight your senses with Josie Maran's Whipped Mud Mask. Formulated with argan oil, it infuses the skin with essential nutrients, leaving you with the look and feel of beautiful skin. Whip the formula into your skin and escape into a sensorial wonderland of color, scent, and texture.

name: Stainless Steel Initial Charm Bangle, Gift Boxed
description: How thoughtful. Show your best friend, your mom, your sister, or aunt just how much you care by gifting her this stainless steel bangle. The round initial charm shows it was meant just for her, while the simulated mother-of-pearl dangle offers luminous beauty. And, a gift box makes giving effortless.

name: Vionic Orthotic Leather Slide Sandals - Santos
description: Slide into summer with these orthotic leather sandals from Vionic. The microfiber footbed adds an extra dimension of comfort to the podiatrist-designed footwear. A single, wide leather cross-strap with padded lining keeps the sandal in place with an adjustable buckle. From Vionic(R).

name: Sterling 36" Curb Link Chain Necklace by American West 12.25g
description: Simple and sweet. From American West Jewelry comes this curb link chain necklace with a slightly oxidized finished. Pair it with your favorite pendant for a statement piece that is sure to get noticed. From American West Jewelry.

name: Leather & Sterling Silver Chevron Necklace by American West
description: This smooth and subtle necklace is sure to become a style staple. A leather cord wraps toward an oxidized sterling silver, ribbed V at the center. This classically designed necklace enhances your ensembles without looking too flashy. From American West Jewelry.

name: Scalloped Design Sterling Hoop Earrings by American West
description: Sterling silver swirls. With a scalloped edge, these swirled, artisan-crafted hoops lend a touch of whimsy to your look. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver & Oval Gemstone Ring w/Flower Accents by American West
description: Earthy, yet elegant, this sterling silver gemstone ring from American West Jewelry is a match made in heaven for flowy skirts and strappy sandals. The center cabochon is distinctively displayed within a serrated, bezel-style setting. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling/Brass Bold Ornate Design Cuff by American West
description: Bold in its beauty, this ornately designed cuff bracelet from American West Jewelry is a testament to the natural splendor found in our own backyard. Crafted of brass and sterling silver, it is slightly oxidized for elemental elegance. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver Mother-of-Pearl Cross Cuff by American West
description: At the center of this American West sterling silver cuff's cross design, an oval mother-of-pearl cabochon makes its presence known as a scalloped border winds its way around the cross. From American West Jewelry.

name: Kenneth Johnson Sterling Shield Design Dangle Earrings
description: Take up your shield. A diamond-shaped shield at the post teams with a doorknocker design--formed by an S design and openwork drop with a feather center--for a look that will keep onlookers at bay and in awe. From Kenneth Johnson.

name: Sterling Silver Heart or Cross Bold Enhancer by American West
description: Ride off into the sunset with this sterling silver enhancer from American West Jewelry. Both the heart and cross options feature a ribbed design and an oxidized finish for added texture and spunk. Wear on a chain or cord for a bold and playful look. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver Heart or Cross Bold Ring by American West
description: Style from the soul. Let the dazzling design of this American West ring define your inner self, while the ribbed detail and oxidized finish complete the contemporary look. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver Multi-Gemstone Ring or Enhancer by American West
American West Sterling/Brass Turquoise Leather Enhancer
description: Intricacy abounds. Add some inspired design to your collection with this fetching sterling silver and brass enhancer from American West Jewelry. Pear-shaped turquoise cabochons in the center are accented with brass swirls and a braided brown leather border. From American West Jewelry.

name: Sterling/Brass Turquoise Leather Cuff by American West
description: Definitely casual chic. Brown braided leather outlines the sterling silver and brass design at the center of this American West cuff. Pear-shaped, greenish-blue turquoise cabochons impart vibrant color and a dose of southwestern style. From American West Jewelry.

name: Denim & Co. Vertical Printed Long Sleeve Top
description: Stand out from the crowd with this Denim & Co. long-sleeved top. The solid sleeves and back emphasize the printed front, while the scoop neckline adds a touch of simplicity. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Legacy Capri Length Skirted Leggings
description: If you love the ease of leggings but prefer more modesty, these versatile capri-length skirted leggings from Legacy(R) Legwear are the perfect fit. Offered in your choice of colors and patterns, this figure-flattering combo provides additional coverage that wears beautifully with a wider range of top styles. Now you can style leggings your way--and enjoy unlimited options!

name: MyPillow Set of 2 Classic Pillows with Color Cording
SnapBaskets Set of 2 Shopping & Utility Baskets by CleverMade
description: A snappier solution. This set of two SnapBaskets from CleverMade replaces your beat-up bags and containers with a lightweight, durable design that opens and closes in a snap--literally. Simply hold the SnapBasket by the reinforced stitched handles, and let gravity do the rest. Use it for a laundry basket, shopping bag, beach tote. When you're done, just snap it flat until you need it again. From CleverMade.

name: Barbara King Floral Dance Reversible Outdoor Mat w/ Matching 3x5Mat
Attitudes by Renee Printed Faux Wrap Knit Jumpsuit
LOGO by Lori Goldstein Knit Top with Pockets and Sequin Trim
description: Positively perfect, this LOGO by Lori Goldstein knit top keeps you looking your best all day long. The scoop neckline is accented with sequin and trim details, while two front pleated patch pockets near the hem add an element of fun. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: Susan Graver Reversible Printed Button Front Jacket w/ Hood
description: Pick your side. Whether you want solid or polka dot, this fully lined reversible hooded jacket will have your style covered. From Susan Graver.

name: Dansko Leather Double Strap Block Heel Slide Sandals - Lenny
description: New sandal on the block. This intriguing double-strap Dansko slide sits atop a sturdy block heel. The insole is padded for comfort, and the outsole is textured for traction. From Dansko.

name: It Works! Set of 3 Multi-Stain Removing Paste w/ Applicator
description: Take the stress out of spills. It Works! is a paste that helps remove a variety of stains including, dirt, tar, fruit, grease, beer, and more! Of course, fresh stains are easiest to remove, but this paste also helps remove older stains over multiple treatments. Simply apply the paste using the dampened applicator and work it into any and every troublesome stain in your life. From It Works!

name: Plow & Hearth 6ft. Kissing Flamingos Garden Spinner
description: A kiss of color. Bring some added color and height to your yard with this lovely Plow & Hearth garden spinner. Its vibrant pink kissing flamingos and sparkling beads are sure to bring your landscape to life. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Denim & Co. Long Sleeve Lightweight Stretch Denim Big Shirt Tunic
description: Talk about a style staple. This classic denim big shirt is wardrobe must-have, especially since it comes fashioned with traditional features like a button-front closure and point collar. Pair it with khakis for a preppy yet chic look, or mix it with black pants for a more trendy option. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Styled by Joe Zee Printed Knit Pants
description: Impress in print. These effortless knit pants from Styled by Joe Zee earn extra style points with their fashion-forward print. The shoe-showcasing ankle length looks especially good with boots and a season-spanning sweater, or wear them with a tailored blouse for confidence-boosting workwear. From Styled by Joe Zee.

name: H by Halston Suede Sandals with Ankle Strap - Chase
description: The epitome of simplicity. This sandal from H by Halston features suede straps, an adjustable buckle, and a gently rounded toe, making it low profile with high style. Perfect for summer, these sandals will make you want to slip them on for every occasion. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Perforated Leather Slip-On Shoes - Leah
description: The wear-with-all winner. Slip into effortless elegance with H by Halston's perforated leather shoes that prove you don't have to be high-heeled to be flat-out fabulous. A perforated rounded toe, pieced leather details, and slip-on entry put you in first place for casual comfort and glamorous style. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Leather Sandal with Stacked Block Heel - Lexi
description: Classically designed, these H by Halston Lexi sandals boast a sophisticated style. The open-toe design has an ankle strap with a hook-and-loop closure, making them the perfect choice for a more polished look. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Leather Slip-On Pointed Toe Heel - Scarlett
description: The perfect finishing touch to your look, these leather slip-ons from H by Halston ensure you're poised from head to toe. The pointed toe and cutout detail are perched upon an approximately 4-1/2"H heel. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Suede Flat Espadrille Slide - Norma
description: Slide into summer. Enjoy the sunny day in style with these H by Halston Norma espadrille slides. The pair is ready to wear with skirts, capris, and sun dresses. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Open-Toe Leather Mules w/ Stacked Heel - Kendra
description: Enter the atmosphere of sophistication. This H by Halston leather mule gets its glamour from a sky-high, 4-1/2"H stacked heel. Hidden goring provides give that makes the open-toe style easy to slip into and wear. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Pointed Toe Snake Embossed Leather Slide - Alina
description: For a look that's totally on point, slip on these leather slides from H by Halston. The pointed toe and embossed snake design give these shoes a fashionable feel, while the no-strap style and mini block heel provide comfort and easy-to-wear appeal. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Leather Criss- Cross Platform Sandals - Rosie
description: Modern chic. Done in colorful leather, these Rosie sandals from H by Halston are both comfy and casual with an open toe, crisscross design, and platform sole. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Leather Flats with Adjustable Strap - Layla
description: Poised for perfection. With a pointed toe and mini stacked heel, these leather flats from H by Halston are stylishly appointed for nearly any occasion. An adjustable strap ensures a comfortable fit. From H by Halston.

name: GK George Kotsiopoulos Bracelet Sleeve Dress with Peplum Hem
description: Prepare for compliments--you're going to attract plenty in this jacquard A-line dress by George Kotsiopoulos. Designed with a peplum hem, bracelet sleeves, and an exposed zipper at back, it's right on trend yet timelessly ladylike. From GK George Kotsiopoulos.

name: GK George Kotsiopoulos Printed Long Sleeve Hi-Low Hem Top
description: Mix it up. This GK George Kotsiopoulos top offsets the printed woven body with solid knit side panels and sleeves for a cool, contrasting look. The hi-low hem is ultra-flattering. From GK George Kotsiopoulos.

name: Styled by Joe Zee Color-Block Sweater
description: Rock the color-blocked trend in this Styled by Joe Zee knit sweater, featuring a flattering boat neckline with a feminine back keyhole detail. From Styled by Joe Zee.

name: Styled by Joe Zee Pleated Button Front Blouse
description: Step up to the pleat. Score one for easy, breezy style in this button-front blouse from Styled by Joe Zee. The classic design gets a fashionably feminine update with the addition of a pleated detail on the front and back. Pair this with straight pants for the easiest office outfit ever. From Styled by Joe Zee.

name: GK George Kotsiopoulos Paneled Faux Leather Skirt
description: A flair for faux. Zip on this flirty faux-leather skirt from GK George Kotsiopoulos and prepare for an all-eyes-on-me moment. This sensational skirt goes from a fitted silhouette at the top to a full, flared hemline. The result is an of-the-moment look that's sure to put a swing in your step. From GK George Kotsiopoulos.

name: SA by Seth Aaron Printed Knit Long Sleeve Top
description: Above average. An asymmetric neckline with a slight cold-shoulder detail ensures that this printed top is anything but ordinary. From SA by Seth Aaron.

name: GK by George Kotsiopoulos Mixed Media Slim Leg Pants
description: Mix mastered. A mix of materials makes these slim leg pants from GK George Kotsiopoulos multi-textured trendsetters. Fab faux leather panels at the inner legs and pockets give these a slimming silhouette that looks equally good with an oversized sweater or a blouse and a blazer. From GK George Kotsiopoulos.

name: Styled by Joe Zee Floral Printed Dress with Neck Tie Detail
description: Fit to be tied. Feel fun, flirty, and fabulous in this floral dress from Styled by Joe Zee. Finished off with an attached neck tie detail, this delightful dress includes versatile 3/4-length sleeves and zipper closure. From Styled by Joe Zee.

name: GK George Kotsiopoulos Drape Front Blazer with Zipper Detail
description: Blaze your own trail in this gorgeous draped front blazer from George Kotsiopoulos. Spot-on style details include a chic cutaway front hem and two faux-zip pockets on each side. Wear this au courant apparel with slim trousers for a workday look that positively wows. From GK George Kotsiopoulos.

name: Kelly by Clinton Kelly Perforated Faux Suede Jacket
description: Perforation sophistication. Chic details abound on this classic faux suede jacket from Kelly by Clinton Kelly. The stylish silhouette gets an of-the-moment update from exposed zipper details and the subtle perforation of its trend-savvy faux suede. From Kelly by Clinton Kelly.

name: Denim & Co. Essentials Scoopneck T-Shirt w/ Trim
description: Here's the scoop. This Denim & Co. T-shirt is both practical and pretty. Flirty trim detail along the scoop neckline and short sleeves make this cute cotton top a must-have casual piece. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. Animal Printed Raglan Sleeve Scoop Neck Top
description: Slant pattern. The lively print on the front of this top from Denim & Co. is complemented by the slimming solid of the sides and back. Long raglan sleeves add a sporty touch and a hi-low hemline provides the length you love. Pair this with your favorite jeans for casual coffee with friends. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Studio By Denim & Co. Open Front Short Dolman Sleeve Cardigan
description: The generous cut of this open-front knit cardigan by Denim & Co. keeps your look current--and comfortably covered. Try the dolman-sleeve style over jeans and a tee, a tank dress, and more. From Studio by Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Plow & Hearth Polyresin Snuggle Bunnies Garden Statue
description: Need some bunny to love? These too-cute cuddlers will add a bit of "hoppiness" to your garden, porch, or living room. Sculpted from durable polyresin, these critters are just as comfortable outdoors as they are inside. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Plow & Hearth Glass Top Solar Garden Mobile with Windchime
description: Satisfy your senses with Plow & Hearth's enchanting mobile featuring chimes and illuminated garden-inspired shapes. A solar panel soaks up the sun during the day to power a dazzling nighttime display. Removable chimes let you enjoy this splendid sight with or without sound. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Plow & Hearth Solar Fairy Stump with Welcome Sign
description: Fairies find a place to congregate in your yard when you add this tree stump to your garden decor. It's sweetly styled with flower accents and a welcome sign hangs above the doorway. Inside is a tiny table and chairs--just the perfect place for a bit of whimsy and wonder. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Plow & Hearth Mercury Glass Solar Lighted Gazing Ball And Pedestal
description: Gaze upon color all year long. Plow & Hearth present this mercury glass gazing ball--it pops with color during the day and illuminates with a glittery glow at night. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Plow & Hearth Set of 2 Weather Resistant Planters
Plow & Hearth Metal Angel with Solar Crackle Ball
description: Glowing guardian. Day and night, this radiant angel from Plow & Hearth watches over your backyard or garden. The color-changing solar orb she holds soaks up the sun by day, and gives off a heavenly glow at night. From Plow & Hearth.

name: Plow & Hearth 6-foot Feather Garden Spinner
description: Pretty as a peacock. Add some wind-inspired wonder to your landscape with this feather garden spinner by Plow & Hearth. This 6'H outdoor sculpture is designed to emulate the beauty of brightly colored feathers. The result is an exceptional, animated addition to your yard. From Plow & Hearth.

name: 8 Pc Cordless Indoor/Outdoor Power Scrubber, Extension Tool & Accessories
description: Power through tough cleaning jobs using this handy scrubber--no bending, kneeling, or getting on hands and knees required. Cord-free and convenient, the scrubber comes equipped with rotating heads and an extendable handle to target those out-of-reach tough spots. Four removable brush heads of different shapes and sizes, plus three microfiber cloths let you easily tackle a variety of tasks, from dirty floors and bathtubs to auto wheels, exterior windows, and gutters. Whatever the job, this portable power scrubber is a better, easier way to banish everyday messes. From Gardus.

name: Don Aslett's Set of 2 16oz. Professional Wood Cleaner and Polish
description: Help clean, protect, and preserve. Don Aslett's professional formula does more than just clean your wooden furniture, it revitalizes and repels dust! From Don Aslett.

name: Don Aslett's Super-size Microfiber Mop with 8 Washable Pads
description: No mess is a match for microfiber! The Super-size Microfiber Mop from Don Aslett preps you with all you need for cleaning hard floors--and more--with the magic of microfiber and water! Use the included pads to dust, scrub, and clean with ease, then throw them in the wash to use over and over again. From Don Aslett.

name: 50 Piece Premium Microfiber Towel Set by Campanelli
description: Dirt magnets. Load yourself with the ammo for some serious cleaning with this 50-piece microfiber towel set by Campanelli Products. Each 12" x 12" towel uses Magnefiber technology to capture dirt and dust like a magnet. From Campanelli Products.

name: Denim & Co. Stretch Boot Cut Leggings
Dansko Professional Leather Slip-On Clogs
Dansko Leather Open-toe Sandals with Adjustable Straps - Joanie
description: Let's go retro! With an open toe and buckled straps at the ankles and toes, the Joanie leather sandals from Dansko speak to that iconic '70s style. A comfy padded insole and textured outsole bring the benefits of today's construction. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Embroidered Block Heel Sandals - Lisa
description: With an embroidered leather upper, block heel, and brasstone hardware, these Dansko sandals give you all the gorgeous details. The slingback strap adjusts with a simple hook-and-loop closure, for easy on and off. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Leather Closed-toe Sandals with Backstrap - Milly
description: With a closed toe and tasteful woven design, this beautifully constructed Dansko leather sandal feels classic and familiar. A breathable leather lining and padded insole make it comfy and easy for any errand, shopping trip, or lunch date. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Closed-toe Sandals with Adj. Ankle - Maisie
description: Mais oui. Say yes to the Maisie closed-toe comfort sandal from Dansko--a casual combination of signature support and stylish simplicity. Design details include a rounded closed toe, adjustable ankle strap, and openwork heel design. Wear the feel-good Maisie for all-day comfort at work or play. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Leather Criss Cross Strap Sandals - Jacinda
description: With the Dansko Jacinda leather sandals, you get everything you need in a sandal--a classic design and a fabulous feel. Leather criss-crossed straps at the upper lead to a slingback heel with adjustable buckle detail, leaving you with subtle style and the perfect fit. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Leather Slide Sandals with Double Adj. Straps - Sophie
description: These leather slide sandals from Dansko are sure to put a smile on your face. Double straps adjust for a personalized fit, while the outsole provides traction. From Dansko.

name: Dansko Canvas or Suede Twin Gore Slip-on Sneaker -Belle
Susan Graver Cozy Knit Long Sleeve V-Neck Sweater with Pockets
description: Cuddly chic. Feel fabulous from morning to night in this cozy Susan Graver sweater, designed in a snuggly soft fabric with two front hip pockets and a flattering V-neckline. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Printed Stretch Woven Zip Front Capri Pants
description: Pretty in print. The allover print on these Susan Graver stretch woven capris adds a touch of excitement to your routine, while the elastic waistband and zip front fly make sure all your summer days are comfortable. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Coastal Stretch Zip Front Bermuda Shorts
description: In versatile Coastal Stretch, these Bermudas bring out your best! From Susan Graver, the longer-length and sleek fabric provide comfy coverage that holds up all day and looks dressy enough for dinner. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Weekend French Terry Zip Front Jacket with Pockets
description: Cover up in class and comfort with this soft, French terry zip front jacket. A Mandarin collar adds a touch of unique style whether wearing on a chilly morning or a rainy day. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Weekend French Terry Zip Front Jacket
description: Unbelievably comfy, incredibly chic. From Susan Graver, this French terry knit jacket looks so stylish with the convertible collar and front zip closure with quilted design. Pull this jacket on to pull off your new look. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Ponte Jacket with Faux Leather Trim
Susan Graver Plush Knit Long Sleeve Hooded Sweater w/ Pocket
description: The hoodie goes to new heights. Polished yet comfy, this Susan Graver PlushKnit(R) hooded sweater is ready for a posh ski resort--or a Saturday afternoon at home. Ribbed cuffs finish the long sleeves, while a kangaroo pocket keeps your hands cozy. From Susan Graver.

name: Susan Graver Artisan Embellished Butterknit Cold Shoulder Top
description: Designer details give this Butterknit top its stylish appeal. The bateau neckline glistens with embellishments, and cutouts at each shoulder lend a modern vibe. From Susan Graver.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Slub Knit Open Front Cocoon Cardigan
description: A transformative piece for your wardrobe, this cocoon cardigan from Lori Goldstein takes your basics to new heights. The slub knit fabric lends essential texture, while on-seam pockets deliver chic convenience. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Knit Tank with Contrast Neck Trim
description: Charming contrast. Lori Goldstein puts her terrific touch on this sleek sleeveless  knit tank. Contrast trim accents the scoop neckline. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Printed Knit Top with Lace Trim
description: Paint the town in this printed top by Lori Goldstein. Its allover print and lace trim show the world what a work of art you truly are. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO Lounge by Lori Goldstein Slub Knit Hoodie with Pockets
description: Slip into something more comfortable. You can't go wrong with the cozy fabric of this hooded top--it's perfect for relaxing at home, but also looks adorable with jeans when you're out. The convenient pockets are just a bonus. From LOGO Lounge by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO Layers by Lori Goldstein Striped Straight Hem Knit Tank
description: Stripe it rich. You'll have a wealth of wearing options with this knit tank by Lori Goldstein in your wardrobe. Pair it with a jacket and pants for the office. Or with shorts or a skirt for a stylish summertime look. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Knit Vest with Contrast Pocket Detail
description: Quick change artist. This lightweight vest from Lori Goldstein is the easiest way to liven up your warm-weather fashions. Attention is paid to every detail including a seamed V-neckline and cute contrast lining in the front slit pockets. Give a new look to any outfit with this absolutely essential accessory. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Split Back Knit Top with 3/4 Sleeves
description: Look great coming and going in this cotton-modal LOGO by Lori Goldstein top. Featuring two front hip pockets and a split back with a printed chiffon insert, it has a slouchy, hi-low silhouette for a flattering 360-degree view. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: H by Halston Chiffon Maxi Skirt with Knit Lining
description: Walk on air in this chiffon maxi skirt from H by Halston. Its pull-on styling and side slits make looking elegant and graceful easier than ever. From H by Halston.

name: H by Halston Essentials Scoop Neck Knit Top
description: Keep it simple--but don't sacrifice style--when you choose this scoop neckline top from H by Halston. A slight hi-low hemline and smart slit details lend distinguishing fashion appeal. From H by Halston.

name: Five Stone Sterling Silver 23.0g Cuff Bracelet by American West
description: It's all in the wrist! This American West cuff bracelet evokes images of colorful landscapes and a story-studded past. Proudly designed and crafted in the United States, it captures the beauty and rich history of the western region in sterling silver and gemstones. You'll reach for this one time and time again. From American West Jewelry.

name: Joan Rivers Leaf Print Jersey Knit Caftan
Denim & Co. Active French Terry Slim Leg Ankle Pants w/ Pockets
description: Slim is in and these ankle pants from Denim & Co. have the skinny on easy comfort and style. A slim silhouette and soft French terry fabric make these pull-ons the perfect pair for everyday wear. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Stan Herman Fleck French Terry Hooded Poncho
description: Weekend warrior. You'll reach for this Stan Herman hooded poncho time and again. The relaxed fit and comfy French terry fabrication make it a delight to wear, while the too-cute style is undeniably perfect for a variety of casual outings. From Stan Herman.

name: philosophy grace & love 4-piece fragrance collection
description: Smell good. Feel good. Enjoy the feeling of grace and love with this sophisticated, beautifully feminine four-piece philosophy fragrance collection that offers you a total scent and layering experience to cleanse, polish, nourish, and perfume your skin and uplift and inspire your perfect mood.

name: Denim & Co. Button Front 3/4 Lace Sleeve Blouse
description: Breeze right through this season and into the next wearing this Denim & Co. button-down top. Classic and feminine, it's fashioned with 3/4-length lace sleeves, a slightly curved hemline, and a Y-shaped neckline. Pair it with crop pants or white jeans in the spring and summer. Layer it over a tank when the cooler weather arrives. And find yourself reaching for it all year long. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Clarks Cloud Steppers Stretch Slip-on Shoes - Sillian Firn
description: Stay light on your feet in these comfy and cool Clarks Cloud Steppers slip-ons. The layered stretchy upper keeps your foot securly in place, while the removable insole makes it easy to customize your fit and feel. From Clarks Footwear.

description: Perfectly perforated. Depending on how you style them, these suede leather Earth booties can be daring or demure. A peep toe and metallic stud closure add to their allure. From Earth Brands Footwear.

name: Vera Bradley Mesh Sequin Tote
description: There's no telling how far this tote will take you. From the airport to the beach, Vera Bradley's mesh sequin tote is going to get the job done and shine at the same time. The base ensures that this beauty is sturdy as well. From Vera Bradley Handbags and Accessories.

name: Clarks Cloud Steppers Slip-on Shoes - Sillian Rhodes
description: Enjoy less bending and more comfort when you slip on these Clarks Cloud Steppers clogs. Fix the adjustable ruched strap once and float along on an insole padded with Cushion Soft technology. From Clarks Footwear.

name: Sole Society Suede or Printed Kitten Heel Pumps - Desi
Vionic Set of 2 Full and 3/4 Length Orthotic Inserts
description: Shoe-in support. Enhance the support of any flat or low-heeled shoe with this set of two orthotic inserts from Vionic. Each pair has a podiatrist-designed EVA base with deep heel cups and built-in arch support. One pair fits best in shoes without a removable insole; the other in shoes with a removable insole. The bottom line? Sweet relief for your feet has never been more convenient. From Vionic.

name: Lug North/South Quilted Overnight Bag - Boxer
description: Quick trips call for organization and style, and this overnight bag packs both. On the outside, four front zip pockets, a side water bottle pocket, and shoe compartment keep all your essentials handy, while double handles and a removable strap make it easy to maneuver throughout the hotel, airport, your in-laws' house, or wherever the day takes you. From Lug.

name: Vionic Orthotic Leather Thong Sandals - Karina
description: All-around amazing. The bold metal ring on these leather thong sandals from Vionic takes their style from simple to sensational. A podiatrist-designed footbed with Orthaheel technology adds next-level comfort. Perfect for a day at the beach and pretty enough for a night on the town. From Vionic.

name: H by Halston Draped Wrap Front Knit Elbow Sleeve Top
description: Get the drape--without being overly dressy--in this chic wrap-front top from H by Halston. This terrific knit boasts a signature draped-front style, along with a snap closure, elbow-length sleeves, and an elastic band at the waist. Dress it up for an easy and chic day at the office or down for a stylish Saturday outing. From H by Halston.

name: Denim & Co. Button Front 3/4 Lace Sleeve Blouse
description: Breeze right through this season and into the next wearing this Denim & Co. button-down top. Classic and feminine, it's fashioned with 3/4-length lace sleeves, a slightly curved hemline, and a Y-shaped neckline. Pair it with crop pants or white jeans in the spring and summer. Layer it over a tank when the cooler weather arrives. And find yourself reaching for it all year long. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Aviator Recordable 8in1 Wooden Music Center with Bluetooth
description: Relive the soundtrack of your life--and enjoy the latest hits--with Aviator's classic spin on modern technology! The 8-in-1 music center is the perfect combo of old and new--that lets you enjoy and record your music, no matter what format it's in.

name: Sterling Silver Sleeping Beauty Turquoise Cross Enhancer by American West
description: Keep your beliefs close to your heart with this American West cross enhancer. Sleeping Beauty turquoise cabochons and sterling silver combine to create this sweet reminder of your faith. A slightly oxidized finish adds an eye-catching effect. From American West Jewelry.

name: philosophy super-size lemon custard & vanilla coconut gel & lotion
description: Indulge without the calories with philosophy's super-size shower gel and lotion set, in your choice of vanilla coconut or lemon custard.

name: Sterling Silver Bold Rose Cuff by Or Paz
description: Beauty in bloom. A bold rose with leaf accents sits atop this polished sterling silver cuff from Or Paz. The lightweight design is simple to wear. From Or Paz(R) Sterling Silver Jewelry from Israel.

name: Glittered Magnolia, Pinecone, & Berry Floral Collection
Ethiopian Opal and Precious Gemstone Ring 14K Gold 1.75 cttw
description: Marvel at the radiance of this Ethiopian opal ring, stunning with a surrounding halo of sparkling bead-set diamonds. For an added touch of color and pizzazz, clusters of bead-set gemstones appear on either side of the 14K yellow gold shank.

name: 14K Gold Diamond Cut Rope Chain Necklace, 2.3g - 5.1g
Baguette Diamond Bangle, 14K Gold, by Affinity
Oro Nuovo Elongated Oval Twist Hoop Earrings, 14K
Oro Nuovo 1-1/4" Elongated Oval Hoop Earrings, 14K
description: Remember peeking in to your mother's jewelry box and trying on your favorite pieces? Feel that same exhilaration when you slip on these Oro Nuovo(R) earrings. Bold and beautiful, these Italian-inspired earrings have an elongated oval hoop design that is substantial yet lightweight, flattering and feminine all at once. Don't miss a golden opportunity to indulge in the everlasting beauty of 14K gold--a look as radiant as your fondest memories. From Oro Nuovo Fine Italian Jewelry.

name: 14K Gold Triple Curb & Byzantine Woven Bracelet
Set of 12 Frosted Spruce Evergreen Picks
description: A winter pick-me-up. Add these 12 frosted spruce evergreen picks to your seasonal decor for a versatile accent that brings the great outdoors inside.

name: 14K Gold Australian Opal Triplet Cross Pendant
description: Keep the faith, lose the weight. This 14K gold cross pendant boldly proclaims your beliefs in a lovely and lightweight way, thanks to the electroforming process by which it was created. This highly polished pendant shines with four pear-shaped Australian opal triplets at the points of the cross, each consisting of a clear glass top, an Australian opal center, and a black glass base.

name: Kringle Express Illuminated Porcelain Reindeer or Sleigh
Set of 3 2.5" Wide 10 Yard Wired Glitter Ribbons
description: Make your holidays sparkle with this beautiful ribbon set. The gorgeous glittered designs are wired for effortless arranging on your mantel place, tree, or presents.

name: Cheryl's Set of 5 Snow Globe Tins with 40 Piece Treats
Set of 16 Glittered Wood Snowflake Ornaments
description: Fully glittered and cut from wood, these ornaments come in two different sizes for variety that completes any holiday tree or wintery display.

name: Set of 6 Glittered Forest Friends Ornaments with Embellishments
description: Save some space on your tree for these friends of the forest. This set of six ornaments comes fully glittered and trimmed with pine sprigs, poinsettias, red berries, and ribbon. Beautifully detailed birds and reindeer make up the collection and have a look that brings a ton of life to your tree this holiday season.

name: Bethlehem Lights Woodland Pine Christmas Tree with Instant Power
Set of 7 Metallic Glittered Leaf Picks
description: A touch of sparkle for the holiday season. These metallic glittered leaf picks are perfect for your garlands, wreaths, and centerpieces. They have sturdy, yet flexible, wired bases, so they'll stay put wherever you place them inside your home, all while spicing up your holiday decor.

name: 40-piece Decorator Miniature Ornament Set
description: Trimming the tree just got a whole lot easier with this 40-piece set of colorful miniature ornaments. Each sports a silvertone cap for an added bit of shimmer, as well as shatter-resistant construction. Their size also makes them ideal for adding to centerpieces, garlands, wreaths, and pretty packages.

name: Set of 5 Elegant Mercury Glass Finials
description: The finial touch. Complete your decor with the elegant flourish of these mercury glass finials. The five-piece sets include a variety of designs in small, medium, and large sizes. Display them together for a dramatic decoration or place them throughout the room on mantels, shelves, and tabletops.

name: Set of 2 Mercury Glass Glittered Birds with Feather Nests
description: Winged wonders. A sensational, sparkling addition to your holiday decor, this duo of glittered, mercury glass birds can adorn your tree, mantel, holiday buffet, and more. The included feathered nests can be clipped to the birds or hung separately.

name: Crazy Aaron's Thinking Putty w/ Two 4" Tins & Two 2" Tins
description: Kids go nutty with Crazy Aaron's Thinking Putty for endless fun, cool tricks, and experiments. The set includes putty that glows in the dark, morphs colors, and more. Bend it, sculpt it, bounce it, and stretch it.

name: Byers Choice Holiday Baking Santa Claus or Mrs. Claus
description: Confectioner's bliss. You'll adore this Claus figurine that captures the joy of holiday baking as well as the spirit of the season. From Byers Choice Ltd.

name: Kringle Express Illuminated Porcelain 9" Christmas Character
description: Decorate, illuminate, and love. This 9" Kringle Express porcelain Christmas character has incredible detail with LED lights that highlight its design. Warm up your home decor with this beautiful piece each night leading up to Santa's arrival. From Kringle Express.

name: Byers Choice Table with Cookies and Milk for Santa
description: A Christmas Eve must, this Byers Choice table with cookies and milk will surely please Santa as he takes a break from filling stockings and delivering gifts. A sweet and nostalgic accessory to finish your holiday display. From Byers Choice Ltd.

name: Mrs. Prindables 10 Individual Size Apples with Holiday Gift Bags
Kringle Express Illuminated Mercury Glass Character on Pedestal

Illuminated Glittered Bay Leaf 24" Wreath or 5' Garland

name: Kringle Express S/2 Battery Op. Lit Marquee Stocking Holders

Sterling Silver Lace Bead Cuff by Or Paz 10.5g

From Or Paz(R) Sterling Silver Jewelry from Israel.

name: philosophy gift of miracles 4pc skincare collection

name: philosophy grace & love 4-piece fragrance collection

Sterling Silver Longhorn Necklace by American West

Denim & Co. Short Sleeve Embroidered Gauze Peasant Top

ClutterFree Set of 60 Cascading Hangers with 10 Pant Clips

name: Vera Bradley Signature Print Overnight Bag
description: Perfect for weekend getaways, this Vera Bradley duffle bag is fashioned with a fun signature print. Plenty of pockets make room for all your belongings and keep you organized. From Vera Bradley Handbags and Accessories.

name: Vera Bradley Signature Print Set of 3 Cosmetic Cases
description: Keep your cosmetics under control with this three-piece set of Vera Bradley cases. With three convenient sizes adorned with stylish signature prints that make you smile, these cute cases are great containers for you makeup, hair accessories, travel-sized products, and more. From Vera Bradley Handbags and Accessories.

name: Legacy Slim Disguise Shaper Tee with 3/4 Sleeves
description: This figure-flattering shaper tee is sure to become your wardrobe's best friend. Wear it underneath tops and cardigans to create a smoother-looking, more shapely midriff. From Legacy(R) Fashions.

name: Extraordinary Life Set of 3 Sterling Silver Charm Bangles with Gift Boxes
description: Three beautiful bangles, one extraordinary deal. Share a little heartfelt inspiration this season with these sterling silver bangles from Extraordinary Life. Each expandable bangle comes with thoughtful messages and charms to tell a loved one how you feel--fitting their wrist and personality perfectly. Use the individual gift boxes to give multiple meaningful gifts, even keep one to express yourself through these artistic accessories.

name: Vionic Orthotic Mesh Slip-on Sneakers - Hydra
description: Get your year in gear in these Vionic slip-on sneakers. Wherever your resolutions take you, you'll go the distance in comfort and style with lightweight mesh and the support of an orthotic footbed. Freshen up your wardrobe and put extra spring in your step with new sneakers that are designed to help reduce stress on your feet. Slip them on for a brisk walk or errand run, and feel the stable comfort you get from these stylish sneaks. From Vionic(R).

name: Vionic Orthotic Embellished T-strap Sandals - Navassa
description: For the love of all that shines--and supports your foot--slip on these embellished T-strap sandals from Vionic. Faux jewels down the vamp feel right from day to dinner, while a biomechanical footbed with Orthaheel technology earns them all-day excellence for relieving your heel and knee pain. From Vionic(R).

name: G.I.L.I. Pebble Leather Monogram Pouch
description: What's in a name? If you're G.I.L.I., it's giving this pebble leather monogram pouch seriously sophisticated detail, like a shiny tassel pull that plays off the goldtone monogram. Sure to inspire oohs and aahs at an event or dinner, it's sized to store all the essentials, but also easy to drop in a larger bag. From G.I.L.I. got it love it(R).

name: Vionic Orthotic Leather & Mesh Thong Sandals - Tide II
description: Ditch the dime-store flip-flops that don't do your feet justice. These leather and mesh thong sandals not only raise your style quotient, but their podiatrist-designed footbed helps stabilize, support, and realign feet to keep you going strong. From Orthaheel.

name: Vionic 2 Pack Relief Full Length Orthotic Inserts
description: Add extraordinary support to your everyday shoes with these full-length orthotic inserts. These inserts are ideal for flat or low-heeled shoes without removable insoles. The lightweight, medium-density EVA base provides maximum support and comfort. From Orthaheel.

name: Vionic Orthotic Leather Thong Sandals - Karina
description: All-around amazing. The bold metal ring on these leather thong sandals from Vionic takes their style from simple to sensational. A podiatrist-designed footbed with Orthaheel technology adds next-level comfort. Perfect for a day at the beach and pretty enough for a night on the town. From Vionic.

name: Extraordinary Life Set of 3 Sterling Silver Charm Bangles with Gift Boxes
description: Three beautiful bangles, one extraordinary deal. Share a little heartfelt inspiration this season with these sterling silver bangles from Extraordinary Life. Each expandable bangle comes with thoughtful messages and charms to tell a loved one how you feel--fitting their wrist and personality perfectly. Use the individual gift boxes to give multiple meaningful gifts, even keep one to express yourself through these artistic accessories.

name: Vionic Orthotic Mesh Walking Sneakers - Alliance
description: Ready for a fresh start? Enjoy a walk with these lightweight, orthotic sneakers from Vionic(R). Not only are these flexible shoes made to satisfy your fashionable side, they're also designed with your complete comfort in mind. Make a pact with the Alliance shoes to put your feet first and get the style and support you need with each and every step.

name: Vionic Orthotic Embellished Slide Sandals - Viviana
description: Elevate your comfort--and your look--with the Viviana embellished slide sandals from Vionic(R) with Orthaheel(R) technology. Flaunting a jewel embellishment and cork-print footbed, these beauties deliver incredible support in a fabulously on-trend style. They'll be your go-to slides for busy days and brunch dates alike.

name: Gemstone Sterling Silver Adjustable Drop Necklace 0.85 cttw
description: Color pops from this sterling silver gemstone drop necklace. A linear design pendant complements many necklines--especially V-necks--creating a perfect finishing touch to both formal and casual looks.

name: Sterling Silver Polished Oval Hinged Bangle by Silver Style
description: Getting in shape. This oval bangle secures your sense of style with its simple snap hinge closure. You'll love its design and will really take a shine to its polished finish.

name: Ruby, Emerald or Sapphire Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings 1.50 cttw
description: Add a pop of color to your ensemble with these gemstone and sterling silver hoop earrings. Sparkling, lively gemstones decorate the front while polished sterling silver contrasts from the back for a fun yet sophisticated style.

name: Carolyn Pollack Sterling &Brass Braided Leather Scroll Design Bold Cuff
description: Try something new. From Carolyn Pollack, this unique cuff has a sterling silver and brass scroll design in the center, bordered by braided brown leather. Brass endcaps complete the southwestern-inspired style. From Carolyn Pollack Sterling Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver Roman Glass Bold Ring by Or Paz
description: Work all the angles. By Or Paz, this sterling silver ring displays a pear-shaped, bezel-set Roman glass set on an angle at the center, surrounded by an elegant openwork and freeform design. The gorgeous graduated band includes a hammered and polished back, plus an oxidized finish. From Or Paz(R) Sterling Silver Jewelry from Israel.

name: Carolyn Pollack Sterling & Brass Signature Design Ring Set
description: Wear it your way--four ways. This signature design ring set from Carolyn Pollack is quite the combo. Three stunning styles create four versatile looks that can complement many more outfits. There are two insert rings--one sterling silver and the other brass--that fit inside the sterling silver filigree ring guard--instantly enhancing the design. Wear the sterling or brass band alone for everyday elegance or place a band within the guard when the occasion calls for something a little more fancy. With versatility comes more beautiful possibility. From Carolyn Pollack Sterling Jewelry.

name: Sterling Silver and Roman Glass Vine Design Earrings by Or Paz
description: Everyday elegance. Free-form Roman glass is wrapped with leaf and vine details to create these ornate sterling silver dangle earrings. From Or Paz(R) Sterling Silver Jewelry  from Israel.

name: Oval Kingman Turquoise Textured Sterling Silver Ring
description: Add bold color and texture to your jewelry collection with this Kingman turquoise ring. An oval cabochon sits at the center of the ring--resting inside a textured split shank--for a look that's sure to wow a crowd.

name: Semi-Precious Gemstone Two Stone Sterling Silver Ring, 0.80 cttw
description: Enjoy a double dose of dazzle with this semi-precious gemstone ring. The bold color of two prong-set gemstones pops beautifully against the unique sterling silver band that connects on both sides.

name: UltraFine Silver Gemstone Eternity Band Ring
Sterling Silver Set of 10 Bangles by Silver Style
description: What's better than a bangle? Ten bangles! This sterling silver set from Silver Style shows off a twisted design that layers on a fun and flirty feel. From Silver Style(R).

name: Carolyn Pollack Sterling Silver Signature 5.50ct Amethyst Bypass Cuff
description: Do you dream in amethyst? If so, this swirled Carolyn Pollack cuff is sure to please. Pear-shaped amethyst gemstones punctuate the endcaps of this bypass style. From Carolyn Pollack Sterling Jewelry.

name: Set of 4 Click and Carry Shoulder or Hand Multiple Bag Carrier
description: Ease your burden with a bag carrying device that lets you take hold of many totes at a time. Designed for even distribution of weight, this nifty gadget has a comfortable grip that's easy to grab and doesn't dig into your skin. Simply hold it in your hand or rest it on your shoulder and cut back on all those trips to and from the car unloading groceries.

name: Trolley Dolly 2-in-1 Folding Cart w/Carry Strap & Dolly
description: Trolley or dolly? Get the benefits of both with this two-in-one collapsible folding cart. This handy helper includes oversized wheels that easily roll over stairs, sidewalk curbs, and even sand, as well as a cushioned handle to absorb the bumps. With a storage bag that clips onto the trolley, it even offers a safe and secure place to stow your items during transport.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Cotton Slub Handkerchief Hem Knit Top
description: Conquer it all in this cute and comfy slub knit top from LOGO. The handkerchief hemline falls to a flattering sweep structured for running around or just relaxing. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Color-Block Top with Ribbed Hem
Floxite 9X/1X Lighted Adjustable Vanity Mirror w/ Storage
description: Bigger and brighter. This lighted mirror takes on double duty with two mirrored sides--one featuring a regular view and the other with a 9X magnified view. The bright 360-degree perimeter white lighting brings out your features in clear view. Built-in compartments can store cosmetics or toiletries, and you can fold it flat for travel or storage. From Floxite.

name: Vicenza Silver Sterling Authentic Lire Coin Bracelet
description: Bellissima! Enrich your look with this timeless Vicenza Silver bracelet. An eye-catching array of authentic 20-Lire coins adorns the sensational sterling silver design. Each 18K yellow gold-plated coin is enhanced by a highly polished rope border, giving the bracelet its classic appeal. Wear it when you're dressing up for an elegant touch, or when dressing down for a boho, folksy vibe. Either way, this hand-assembled piece has a style that's right on the money. From Vicenza Silver(R).

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Striped Tank and Solid Knit Top Twin Set
description: Better layered. This twin set by Lori Goldstein pairs a striped racerback tank is beautifully highlighted by a solid color with a short-sleeved top that peeks out from underneath. For an added style element, both layers boast a sassy sharkbite hem. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Slub Knit Tank with Crochet Side Trim
description: The crochet sides and shark-bite hem give this slub knit tank from LOGO its personality points. Simply pair it with an extra-long statement necklace for a truly fashionable look. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Printed Cotton Cashmere Long Sleeve Sweater
description: Put it in print! That's what Lori Goldstein did with this upbeat cotton cashmere sweater. A fresh print on both front and back pairs with quintessential LOGO details, like an easy, relaxed sweep. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Jogger Pants w/ Drawstring Front Tie
description: Run errands or go for a run in these jogger pants by Lori Goldstein. A flat elastic waistband with a drawstring front tie keeps things loose for your comfort. Functional side pockets provide a space for your phone or music player to keep your day interesting. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein Double Buckle T-Strap Block Heels
description: Twice as nice. Two goldtone buckles decorate the Michaella T-strap block heels from LOGO by Lori Goldstein. This pair is ready for capris, dresses, skirts, and fun days. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO Lavish by Lori Goldstein Knit Top with Asymmetric Hem and Embroidery
description: An embroidered front overlay accentuates the daring asymmetric hemline on this top, which is designed to flatter every body shape with its fluid and flowing fabric. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO Layers by Lori Goldstein 3/4 Sleeve Open Front Knit Cardigan
description: The finishing touch. This captivating knit cardigan from LOGO Layers by Lori Goldstein is designed with wide-elbow, 3/4-length sleeve. That makes it pefect for creating a chic layered look over longer sleeved looks or as a lighter layer over tanks and T-shirts. From LOGO Layers by Lori Goldstein.

name: LOGO by Lori Goldstein V-neck Tee with 3/4 Sleeves and Pocket Detail
description: Tee-rrific! That's how you'll feel about this V-neck tee with its two front pockets, 3/4 length sleeves, and asymmetric bottom hem. From LOGO by Lori Goldstein.

name: Denim & Co. 3/4 Sleeve Striped Bateau Top
description: Layer at your leisure, or strip down to these stripes! This bateau-neck top is brimming with possibilities. With 3/4-length sleeves that beg to be paired with a solid, long-sleeved tee underneath, this shirt can also be topped off beautifully with a denim jacket. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. Perfect Jersey Elbow Sleeve Stud Detail Cardigan & Tank
description: A winning combination. The elbow-length sleeves on this two-piece tank-and-cardigan set keeps you feeling cool and relaxed, while the stud detail and matching buttons give the look a cute, feminine accent. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. Stretch Boot Cut Leggings
Studio by Denim & Co. Printed Bateau Neck Long Sleeve Top
description: Floral is always fashionable. Flowers of all types and colors blossom across this Studio by Denim & Co. long-sleeved top. Finished with a bateau neckline and curved hi-low hem. From Studio by Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. Stretch Twill Jean Jacket w/Bling Buttons
description: Not just any jacket. Sure, it's got a pretty pointed collar, two chest pockets, and two front pockets, but that doesn't mean this jacket is ordinary. The cotton/spandex blend and boisterous bling buttons put it ahead of the rest. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. "How Timeless" Stretch Pull-on Crop Pants with Button Detail
description: Easy wear, easy care--enjoy the stylish perks of these no-fuss "How Timeless" crop pants. The dyed-to-match plastic button detailing on the hem of the legs lends fashionable flair to this laid-back look. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Denim & Co. Button Front Stretch Denim Cropped Vest
description: Rock the jean jacket look even in warmer weather. With a button-front closure and two chest pockets, this stretch denim vest puts a fun and fashionable spin on any ensemble. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Five Stone Sterling Silver 23.0g Cuff Bracelet by American West
description: It's all in the wrist! This American West cuff bracelet evokes images of colorful landscapes and a story-studded past. Proudly designed and crafted in the United States, it captures the beauty and rich history of the western region in sterling silver and gemstones. You'll reach for this one time and time again. From American West Jewelry.

name: Bronzo Italia Pave' Crystal Oval Hinged Bangle
description: Rock this pave crystal bangle by Bronzo Italia with a little black dress or jeans and a tee--either way you'll look chic as can be. A hinged design and polished edges let it slip on easily and wear comfortably all day or night. From the Bronzo Italia(R) Jewelry Collection.

name: Bronze Mother-of-Pearl Rectangular Watch by Bronzo Italia
Vicenza Silver Sterling Adjustable Lariat Necklace, 10.7g
description: Pull together any look with this sterling silver necklace. Its adjustable lariat-style design offers vogue versatility to your wardrobe. From Vicenza Silver(R).

name: Veronese 18K Clad Lire Coin Rolo Link Charm Bracelet
Bronze Bold Polished Cross Pendant w/30" Rolo Chain by Bronzo Italia
description: Heaven sent. Crafted of beautiful colored bronze, this highly polished cross pendant dangles divinely from an oval rolo link chain. From the Bronzo Italia(R) Jewelry Collection.

name: Vicenza Silver Sterling 500 Lire Coin Round Slip On Bangle Bracelet
description: Timeless treasure. Vicenza Silver combines history and fashion with this 500 lire coin bangle. Three bangles are connection by a polished rolo ring, which has a 500 lire coin with a rope border dangling below. From Vicenza Silver(R).

name: Bronze 500 Lire Coin Omega Necklace by Bronzo Italia
description: Change things up. Flaunting a 500-lire coin pendant, this Bronzo Italia omega necklace gives your day-to-day looks a fresh new feel. From the Bronzo Italia(R) Jewelry Collection.

name: Vicenza Silver Sterling Woven & Polished 4-Row Cuff 17.9g
description: Versatility at its finest. Get the best of both worlds with this Vicenza Silver four-row cuff. Braided sterling sliver rows are woven with 18K yellow gold-clad sterling silver rows to create a unique contrast of color and texture. An intricate design destined to be your favorite go-to piece. From Vicenza Silver(R).

name: Veronese 18K Clad Lire Coin 18" Necklace
description: Look like a million. There's something decidedly distinctive about this Veronese necklace, which boasts a unique arrangement of seven lire coins. With a style that succeeds at being both opulent and classic, this stare-worthy stunner is sure to turn heads. From Veronese Collection(R) Jewelry.

name: DynaTrap Indoor/Outdoor Mosquito and Insect Trap w/Extra Bulbs
Isaac Mizrahi Live! Split V-neck Knit Maxi Dress
Isaac Mizrahi Live! Ceramic Watch with Mother-of-Pearl Dial
description: Arrive fashionably great! As part of the hottest trend in watches, this statement-making ceramic wristwatch from Isaac Mizrahi instantly updates your jewelry wardrobe with designer style.

name: IT Cosmetics Super-Size Hello Lashes Mascara Trio
description: What is it: A super-size kit with three Hello Lashes 5-in-1 Mascaras. Hello Lashes is a multitasking must-have that puts the finishing touch on your lashes, taking the place of volumizing mascara, lash primer, lash-enhancing serum, lash tint, and a lash comb or curler.

name: philosophy purity made simple 6 oz deep clean mask Auto-Delivery
description: What is it: purity made simple deep-clean mask helps improve the appearance of dull, tired skin and gives it a luminous, spa-like glow in just 60 seconds. It's fortified with mineral-rich, deep-cleansing sea salts to help rejuvenate, while marine extracts and vitamin E help smooth the look of skin. See healthier-looking, softer skin in just one use!

name: Earth Leather Wedge Sandals with Cut-Out Details - Cascade
description: Get a step up on spring style with Earth leather wedge sandals. Crafted with a cutout design, it freshens up your warm-weather wardrobe with contemporary style and supportive comfort.

name: Denim & Co. Active French Terry Capris w/ Side Drawstrings
description: Sought-after softness. French terry makes these casual capris from Denim & Co. an everyday fashion favorite. Front pockets add to their practicality, while a drawstring detail adds to their sporty appeal. So soft and casually stylish, you'll want more than one pair. From Denim & Co.(R) Fashions.

name: Poo-Pourri Set of (3) 4 oz. Bathroom Deodorizers in Organza Bags
description: Keeping things fresh has never been so easy. Whether you're at home or visiting family or friends, Poo-Pourri has you covered. This set of three bathroom deodorizers lets you leave one in your home, give one as a gift, and keep one on you for emergency situations. Simply spray the toilet bowl before you go, and let the nine essential oils do the rest of the work, creating a protective film on the surface of the water to help prevent odor. From Poo-Pourri.

name: Haier 12,500BTU Dual Hose Portable Air Conditioner w/3M Filter
description: Find relief from the heat with this portable Haier air conditioner. Enjoy the indoor breeze when you want it--or set the 24-hour timer for automatic operation. A handy remote control lets you switch things up when necessary. And for a clean start, this unit comes with a 3M filter that helps capture dust, dander, and dirt. From Haier.

name: Temp-tations 18" Holiday Platter with Figural Handles
Kuhn Rikon Polka Dot 5-1 Jar Opener
description: Open up a can of--whatever you want! This 5-in-1 jar opener is a must-have for any kitchen. Able to open jars of various sizes, bottle caps, soda can tabs, small lids, and ring tabs, the useful tool is also easy to use. Simply place it on the jar, twist the knob, and the leverage allows you to remove the lid with ease. From Kuhn Rikon.

name: CooksEssentials 7-Piece BBQ Grill Pan with Removable Nonstick Plates
description: This summer, go beyond burgers and hot dogs with the Cook's Essentials(R) Nonstick BBQ Grill Pan. Just fire up your grill and place the grill pan--with any two of the interchangeable inserts--on top. You'll cook everything from shrimp and vegetables to roast chicken and sandwiches without worrying about food falling through the grids. Almost anything you can do on your stovetop, you can now do on your outdoor grill!

name: Breville Stainless Steel 1800W XL Smart Oven w/Cutting Board
description: Let's toast to convenience! Digital controls on this Breville Smart Oven put the functions at your fingertips, while Smart technology automatically adjusts the power and time. Baking and broiling trays, along with a bamboo cutting board increase your options for dishes done perfectly. From Breville.

name: Kuhn Rikon 2.4 Cup Pull & Chop w/Extra Bowl & Storage Lids
description: Pull out all the chops. Food prep has never been easier than it is with the Kuhn Rikon Pull and Chop--the ingenious device that lets you easily chop just about any food with a few quick pulls of the built-in handle. This handy set comes with two roomy 2.4-cup bowls and storage lids, so you can easily stow what you've prepped, for meals in record time. From Kuhn Rikon.

name: CooksEssentials 3 qt. One Touch Microwave Pressure Cooker
description: Two time-saving kitchen appliances in one great gadget. From Cook's Essentials, this 3-qt microwave pressure cooker helps retain moisture and nutrients so you can whip up savory sides, soups, stews, and more in a fraction of the time. It's fast food--minus the guilt. From Cook's Essentials(R) Kitchenware.

name: Hampton Popcorn Set of 6 Gourmet Popcorn in Holiday Tubes
Temp-tations Old World or Floral Lace Set of 3 Silicone Lids
FoodSaver V2865 Vertical Flip Stainless Steel Vacuum Sealer w/ 105 Bags
description: Lots of leftovers? Preparing food on the weekend for easier weeknight dinners? Party of one? No matter what your motivation, the FoodSaver V2865 vacuum sealer can help keep foods fresh for longer periods of time by removing excess air. This handy device is also helpful for marinating or freezing foods. And when you're done, it can be flipped on its end to preserve your valuable counter space. From FoodSaver.

name: Lock & Lock 8 piece Nesting Bowl Set
description: Seal the deal with this versatile eight-piece Lock & Lock nesting bowl set. With eight different sizes ranging from 0.42 cups to over 21 cups, you'll have the right size for any food. Whether you're bringing in a fresh batch of cookies to work, packing carrots and dip for a picnic, or doing some freezer cooking, this collection has you covered. From Lock & Lock.

name: Kringle Express 64 Piece EZ Drawstring Gift Bag Set
description: So you've found that perfect gift for that perfect someone, but how are you going to wrap it? With this 64-piece holiday gift bag set, you'll have a bag for every item on your list--right down to specially-sized bags for bottles and gift cards. From Kringle Express.

name: Quacker Factory Simulated "Pearls Just Wanna Have Fun" V-neck T-shirt
description: Rock star. Quacker Factory turns the classic V-neck tee into a stylish look that stands out, with a design of simulated pearls and rhinestones. Add a sparkle--and a smile--to your day. From Quaker Factory.

name: Ryka Lace-Up Running Sneakers - Indigo
description: Hit the gym in style with these running sneakers from Ryka. Lightweight support and stability make your workout easy while the Re-Zorb Lite top layer keeps you comfortable. From Ryka.

name: Clarisonic Mia or Alpha Fit Sonic Cleansing System
G.I.L.I. Leather Sporty Crossbody with Canvas Strap
description: Is it sporty or sophisticated? It's both! Expertly showing off the best of both worlds, this G.I.L.I. crossbody bag is fashioned with a flap closure, a tassel detail, and a canvas strap that's easily removed when you crave a more sleek silhouette. From G.I.L.I. got it love it(R).

name: philosophy lemon custard body polish, bath gel & body souffle trio
description: What is it: From philosophy, this lemon custard trio includes shampoo, shower gel, and bubble bath; glazed body souffle; and body polish scrub--perfectly presented in a festive gift bag.

name: philosophy super-size lemon custard & vanilla coconut gel & lotion
description: Indulge without the calories with philosophy's super-size shower gel and lotion set, in your choice of vanilla coconut or lemon custard.

name: philosophy super-size hope in a tube lip & eye cream Auto-Delivery
description: Treat aging skin to hope in a tube eye and lip cream. With this convenient Auto-Delivery plan, a new shipment arrives approximately every five months for as long as you remain in the program.

name: philosophy super-size triple-acid peel pads Auto-Delivery
description: What is it: Anyone who wants smoother, brighter, and more youthful-looking skin. And those looking to take advantage of this Auto-Delivery program with a new shipment every six months until a total of three shipments is received.

name: philosophy super-size skincare favorites trio
description: Call them your skin-care BFFs. This super-size philosophy set gives you three products you'll always want to keep close, including purity made simple facial cleanser, the microdelivery exfoliating facial wash, and miracle worker moisturizer. From philosophy.

name: philosophy when hope is not enough AM/PM serum duo
description: Reveal hydrated skin at any age with philosophy's when hope is not enough day-and-night serum duo. It's formulated with unique ingredients to help leave skin looking youthful.

name: philosophy state of grace & love 4pc salt scrub collection
description: What is it: From philosophy, this state of grace and love salt scrub collection comes with four hot salt body scrubs in amazing grace, pure grace, living grace, and falling in love.

name: philosophy shear splendor home and away 4-piece set
description: What is it: shear splendor home and away includes two philosophy favorites--extra rich daily shampoo in both 32-oz and 16-oz sizes and extra silky daily conditioner in both 32-oz and 16-oz sizes--brought back from the vault for those who crave added moisture for dull, dry hair.

name: philosophy super-size summer fragrance 32 oz. duo
philosophy super-size gingerbread man 3-in-1 gel 32 oz.
description: What is it: A super-sized bottle of gingerbread man foaming shampoo, bubble bath, and shower gel.

name: philosophy ultimate miracle worker face & eye duo Auto-Delivery
description: What is it: An all-in-one miracle for your best skin, philosophy's antiaging moisturizer and eye cream duo helps protect and defend your skin by helping to address the appearance of the visible signs of aging. Both products are formulated with broad spectrum SPF protection. And thanks to this Auto-Delivery plan, a new shipment arrives approximately every 90 days for one year.

name: philosophy super-size whipped body creme duo
description: Moisturize your skin with a soft touch of grace. This luxuriously lightweight, whipped body moisturizer from philosophy melts onto skin to help improve skin's softness. A delicious addition to your after-bath routine.

name: philosophy grace & love 4-piece fragrance collection
description: Smell good. Feel good. Enjoy the feeling of grace and love with this sophisticated, beautifully feminine four-piece philosophy fragrance collection that offers you a total scent and layering experience to cleanse, polish, nourish, and perfume your skin and uplift and inspire your perfect mood.

name: IT Cosmetics CC Anti-Aging Ombre Radiance Bronzer w/ Luxe Mega Fan Brush
description: What is it: It's your naturally pretty warmth in a compact! This dynamic CC+ Radiance Ombre Bronzer lets you choose matte glow or subtle radiance all in one. Plus, it's CC, which means it helps color-correct the look of imperfections from view! This antiaging formula is perfect for both face and body.

name: IT Cosmetics Brow Power Super Skinny Waterproof Brow Pencil Duo
description: What is it: Your eyebrows have met their perfect match! IT Cosmetics Brow Power Super Skinny Universal Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil features the super-skinny micro-tip, designed and measured to perfectly mimic the exact width of real brow hair. The custom super-skinny micro-tip, combined with the built-in brow grooming spoolie, creates the look of real hair with precise hair-by-hair-like application that adheres to skin, covers gray, and looks like real hair! Brow Power Universal technology adjusts to your hair color based on pressure. It's even available in seven different shades so you can choose the perfect shade for you.

name: IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
description: IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm is a fast-acting cleanser that removes makeup without feeling dry or irritating skin. This paraben-free formula is perfect for all skin types, leaves skin feeling hydrated, and adds a look of radiance while providing moisture!

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Shawl Collar Woven Gingham Blazer
description: Add a touch of sweetness to your day with this gingham blazer by Isaac Mizrahi. Shoulder pads and waist darts keep you looking professional, and two welt pockets provide functionality. From Isaac Mizrahi Live!(TM).

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Ankle Strap Low Wedge Leather Sandals
description: Buckle up--summer is going to be a crazy ride filled with weddings, barbecues, and meeting friends after work. Isaac Mizrahi's low-wedge leather sandals have the sass and sophistication to handle it all. From Isaac Mizrahi Live!(TM).

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Peony Floral Printed V-Neck Cardigan
description: Rosy outlook. Your fashion future looks bright in this vibrant cotton cardi from Isaac Mizrahi. After all, what's not to love about the flattering V-neckline, ribbed cuffs, and button front of this blooming beauty. Wear it with a solid tank and capris for style that's sure to bring a smile. From Isaac Mizrahi Live!(TM).

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Quilted Button Front Knit Jacket
description: Keep it colorful! Done in energizing, eye-catching hues, this quilted knit jacket instantly lets you brighten up for spring--and keeps your wardrobe feeling fresh all year long. A quilted lattice pattern and pointed collar bestow terrific texture and polish while maintaining a cool and casual look that works with everything from jeans to dresses.

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Suede Moccasins w/ Tipped Bow
description: Flat-out fabulous. Fashioned from soft, supple suede and done in Isaac Mizrahi's most popular footwear silhouette, these classic moccasins let you delight in cushiony comfort with virtually no break-in time. Simply pick your favorite color, get them home at an incredible value, and go, go, go.

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Nolita Lamb Leather Canteen Handbag
description: Round out your new look with this Nolita leather mini circle handbag from Isaac Mizrahi. The adjustable strap makes it a cinch to carry, while the removable key fob and inside pockets are perfect for helping you stay organized. From Isaac Mizrahi Live!(TM).

name: Isaac Mizrahi Live! Essentials Crew Neck Knit Tee
description: Basics aren't boring. They're the building blocks of an incredible wardrobe. And, your closet shouldn't be without this essential tee, fashioned with a crew neckline and short sleeves. From Isaac Mizrahi Live!(TM).

name: Sun Joe Multi-Angle Telescoping Pole Hedge Trimmer
description: Cutting hedge. Keep even the tallest of hedges clean-cut with this Sun Joe telescoping trimmer. Its sturdy extension pole reaches up to 13' for exceptional results in maintaining a lovely landscape. From Sun Joe(R).

name: Barbara King Rustic Vertical Garden Container
description: Use this rustic garden container by Barbara King to hang your plants vertically on the wall--and wow visitors with style straight from the latest home and garden magazines. Distressed metal frames three pockets for planting small plants or flowers, in a design that works indoors or out. From Barbara King.

name: Windobully Set of 3 Sliding Window and Door Locks
description: Simple yet secure. Whether you're looking for home security, child safety, or even a pet door, Windobully Sliding Window and Door Locks deliver a quick and easy solution. Just peel and stick directly to your window or glass pane, placing it high for child safety or low for convenience. From Windobully.

name: Bissell Symphony All-in-One Vacuum and Steam Mop
description: Conduct your cleaning routine more efficiently with the Bissell Symphony. This versatile machine offers three ways to clean: as a vacuum, a steamer, or both at the same time. The easy-touch digital controls, dry-tank technology, and quick-release mop pad tray help you find a pitch-perfect way to keep your floors free from dust, dirt, and grime. From Bissell.

name: MiracleFold Standard or Junior Size Laundry Folder w/Hanging Hook
EV Rider Folding Mobility Scooter
Little Giant Liberty 24-in-1 17' Ladder w/ Rock Locks
